name: My Own Game (S0NICOVM)
description:
Finally, my own game.

No exagerations, (some of) my own characters. all by me.

this game has an ton of things like

- corrupted npcs 

- me

- secret passages

- rpg and plantaformer style to play

demo! but seriously, i really liked the style of "My Own Game", so i will continue to make it an full game.

CONTROLS

- Up, Down, Left, Right to control

- Z to jump and X to run
